forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain after midnight. Low around 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers tapering off in the evening with foggy conditions overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers tapering off in the evening with foggy conditions overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low 43F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 53F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
